Classes/Recognition.html#/c:objc(cs)Reco.name: -recognize:
Classes/Recognition.html#/c:objc(cs)Reco.abstract: Performs recognition of a media file name.

Classes/PlexAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)PlexAut.name: +performplexlogin:withPassword:completion:
Classes/PlexAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)PlexAut.abstract: Authenticates a Plex account with a given username and password. If authentication is successful, the token is saved to the login keychain.

Classes/PlexAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)PlexAut.name: +checkplexaccount
Classes/PlexAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)PlexAut.abstract: Checks if a plex account exists in the Keychain. If so, return the username. If not, it will return a blank string.

Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.name: kodionline
Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.abstract: The current Kodi Json RPC reachability status.

Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.name: plexonline
Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.abstract: The current Kodi Json RPC reachability status.

Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.name: -detectmedia
Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.abstract: This detects media from open video players, streams or web browsers

Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.name: -checksstreamlinkinfo:
Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.abstract: Checks if the stream link title is on a ignore list.

Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.name: -setKodiReachAddress:
Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.abstract: Sets the address for the Kodi reachability

Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.name: -setPlexReach:
Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.abstract: Turns on/off Plex Media Server API reachability.

Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.name: -setPlexReachAddress:
Classes/Detection.html#/c:objc(cs)Detect.abstract: Sets the address for the Plex Media Server reachability

Classes/Detection.html.name: Detection
Classes/Detection.html.abstract: This class allows you to detect media that is playing

Classes/PlexAuth.html.abstract: This class handles Plex Media Server authentication.
